name: Neon Authority
description:
This is a game I am submitting to the GBJam! This is my first game! I used GB Studio! I hope you enjoy it! 

## Keyboard Controls

Up - Up Arrow / W  
Down - Down Arrow / S  
Left - Left Arrow / A  
Right - Right Arrow / D  
A - Alt / Z / J  
B - Ctrl / K / X  
Start - Enter  
Select - Shift
